ca.rmen.carmailer
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  ca.rmen.carmailer.Parser

public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

Reads a file containing the body of a mail in plain text or HTML format, and reads a file containing the list of recipients.
This class requires the JSoup library.

Nested Class Summary
static class Parser.BodyType
          Specify what format the mail body file should be read as.

Method Detail

parse

public static Mail.Body parse(java.lang.String filePath,
                              Parser.BodyType bodyType,
                              java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException
Read the file at the given path, and return a Body with the text and html versions of the file.

Parameters:
filePath - the path to the file containing the mail content.
bodyType - the format of the content in the given filePath.
charset - if null, we will guess the charset from the file contents, or if this is an html file which explicitly declares the charset, we will use it. Otherwise we will use the given charset.
Returns:
the content of the mail in plain text and/or HTML format, with the given charset or a charset we were able to guess.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

parseRecipients

public static java.util.List<Recipient> parseRecipients(java.lang.String filePath,
                                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
Read a plain text file containing one e-mail address per line.

Parameters:
filePath - path to a file containing one line per recipient. Each line contains an e-mail address, and optionally some tags separated by |.
charset - the character set to use when reading the given file.
Returns:
the list of Recipient.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
